title: Buckethead Zombie

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Cast off the bucket on your head, becoming 2578: Conehead Zombie.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Detection immunity (the bucket obscures your face).
- After being attacked once, you will transform into 2578: Conehead Zombie.

desc:
Post 2579
*Its mentions of "brainz" permanently echo within the bucket.*
